title: [LFT] Plat mid laner looking to join a competitive team

embed.description: Zami / Platinum 5 56LP / 119W 105L Win Ratio 53% / Anivia - 64W 42L Win Ratio 60%, Rakan - 16W 4L Win Ratio 80%, Thresh - 13W 6L Win Ratio 68%, Taliyah - 8W 11L Win Ratio 42%, Brand - 9W 9L Win Ratio 50%

body:
Im looking to join a competitive team, either for tournaments or flex (or ideally both)

im currently Plat 5, although my lp gain/lose is still pushing me upward.
My main champions are Zoe and Anivia, but i can play pretty much anyone in mid depending on the situation, and of course willing to learn new champs if the need arises
I own all champs for swaps with other team members if im required to (i'de be concerned if this was never the case)

I also have experience with shotcalling and drafting from when i played on sponsored heroes of the storm teams, some of which i can translate to League.

Im willing to play any day and at any time, although when uni starts again i'll have to work around that schedule

If you have any other questions or would like to give me a trial, please add me in game

Regards,
Zami
